author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Doodle: Flash Visits Tomorrowland

locations.name: magic kingdom park sleeping beauty castle

organizations.name: magic kingdom park tiana & lottie enjoy disney
blue fairy passes out pins simba & mufasa have father-son time

text:
In our Disney Doodle, our artists imagine what a Disney character would do or see first if they had the chance to visit a Disney theme park .
This week, artist Ashley Taylor imagined what Flash from “ Zootopia ” would do if he visited Magic Kingdom Park . According to her, he’d head to a guest favorite attraction in Tomorrowland that’s just his speed. 
“The Tomorrowland Transit Authority Peoplemover’s slow pace is definitely something Flash from ‘Zootopia’ would appreciate!” she said. “It was fun to draw some of the ride elements, like the city of Tomorrow!”
For more Disney Doodles, check out the links below:
